Posts.Content:
If they still have questions and you want to know for sure, you should ask about
 BSGI. It's better than MRI and will tell you almost immediately. You can google it and see if you think it might work for you.
Just a thought.
Posts.Title: Lab called to come for follow-up

Posts.Content:
Hi everyone. I was wondering if anyone has heard of BSGI. It seems that with such soreness in your breasts, it would be a better alternative for you. It doesn't compress nearly as bad as a mammogram and it's more accurate, especially in dense breasted women. You should google it and let your doctor know about
 it. They may not know much about
 it.
Posts.Title: Painful breast (3 years now) ultrasound shows nothing - advice

Posts.Content:
If they think you should get a mammogram, ask them about
 BSGI instead. If you're already having pain, having a mammogram may really hurt. BSGI doesn't compress nearly as much. You can google it and see if it's something you would want to talk about
 with your doctor.
Hopefully, it's just any infection that a different antibiotic can fix. 
Good luck.
Posts.Title: sore, warm left breast...
